RAFRI.AS.summary: The objective of the Investment Institution is to give investors access to shares of companies which are based on the African continent or which realize the major part of their sales and/or earnings in this region.
RAFRI.AS.manager_bio: Mr. Vlooswijk has worked for IRIS since 2005 as an investment strategist focusing on North America and emerging markets. Prior to this he worked for Credit Suisse First Boston as an investment banking analyst.
